title: Event Request Schema
description: This Schema defines the event request for pull requests from ODS for object change identification and transmission

EventRequest.description: Event Request from consumer systems describing the kind of event and data to be retreived

EventObject.description: The type of event object expected from ODS

EventType.description: The type of event request from ODS

EventDateTime.description: The date and time at which the even occurred in the source system

EventRequestSystem.description: The system requesting the event data

EventSystemOfTruth.description: The  system of truth at which the event occured

EventBusinessID.description: Business event ID for which the data is being transmitted in the current event

KeyName.description: The Key name for object requested in ODS for the current event from consumer system

KeyValue.description: The key value returned from ODS for the current event request from consumer system
